ALE.Defintion: a kind of beer, normally without fizz / effervescence

ALLIES.Defintion: the countries that fought with Britain in the First and Second World Wars

AMOUNTED TO.Defintion: come to be (the total) when added together

BANQUET.Defintion: very large meal, particularly for a celebration

BATCH.Defintion: a quantity or consignment of goods produced at one time

COMPENSATION.Defintion: something, typically money, given to someone in recognition of loss, suffering, or injury

CONTAMINATED.Defintion: having been made impure or damaged by exposure to or addition of a poisonous or polluting substance

CULT.Defintion: a person or thing that is popular or fashionable among a particular group

DIGNITARY.Defintion: a person considered to be important because of high rank or office

DRUMMING UP BUSINESS.Defintion: encouraging the attraction of potential clients

ERA.Defintion: time, a long and distinct period of history

FELL COMPLETELY OUT OF FAVOUR.Defintion: become unpopular with a group of people

HEYDAY.Defintion: the height of power or popularity

INSCRIBED.Defintion: (of a surface or object) marked with characters

NUTRIENTS.Defintion: a substance that provides nourishment essential for the maintenance of life and for growth

ON THE OFF CHANCE.Defintion: if you do something on the off chance, you do it even though you think it is unlikely to succeed

OYSTERS.Defintion: a large flat sea creature that lives in a shell, some types of which can be eaten either cooked

PEARL.Defintion: a small round jewel that is white and shiny (and that grows inside the shell of an oyster)

PRESS CHARGES.Defintion: accuse someone formally of a crime so that they can be brought to trial

PROSPECT.Defintion: the possibility or likelihood of some future event occurring

SEWERS.Defintion: pipes used to carry away waste water

SITTING.Defintion: a continuous period of being seated, especially when engaged in a particular activity

SLIMY.Defintion: covered with a thick wet unpleasant substance

SLURPING.Defintion: drink or eat (something) with a loud sucking noise

STRETCH.Defintion: a continuous area or expanse of land or water

TESTIFIED.Defintion: acted as a witness in court

TYPHOID.Defintion: an infectious bacterial fever with an eruption of red spots on the chest and abdomen and severe intestinal irritation.
